metadata.title: CVE-2022-39316 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: FreeRDP is a free remote desktop protocol library and clients. In affectedversions there is an out of bound read in ZGFX decoder component ofFreeRDP. A malicious server can trick a FreeRDP based client to read out ofbound data and try to decode it likely resulting in a crash. This issue hasbeen addressed in the 2.9.0 release. Users are advised to upgrade.

criterions.comment: freerdp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
